extendedIngredients.name: arugula
extendedIngredients.original: 1 large bunch arugula, (about 4 ozs), stems trimmed

extendedIngredients.name: goat cheese
extendedIngredients.original: 3 ozs soft goat cheese, broken into small pieces
extendedIngredients.originalName: soft goat cheese, broken into small pieces

title: Chicken Roll-ups With Goat Cheese And Arugula
summary: Chicken Roll-ups With Goat Cheese And Arugulan is a gluten free, primal, and fodmap friendly main course. One portion of this dish contains approximately 41g of protein, 11g of fat, and a total of 275 calories. For $2.65 per serving, this recipe covers 23% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. 49 people found this recipe to be yummy and satisfying. If you have arugula, chicken breast cutlets, coarse salt and ground pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 83%. This score is outstanding. Similar recipes are Chicken Bacon Ranch Lasagna Roll Ups, Chicken Roll-Ups With Feta Cheese and Arugula, and Chicken with Goat Cheese and Arugula.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Season chicken with salt and pepper. On a clean work surface, lay cutlets flat (smooth sides down). Layer each cutlet with arugula; crumble goat cheese in the center. Starting with the narrow end, roll up chicken tightly; seal with a toothpick.

steps.step: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Season chicken with salt and pepper. On a clean work surface, lay cutlets flat (smooth sides down).
Layer each cutlet with arugula; crumble goat cheese in the center. Starting with the narrow end, roll up chicken tightly; seal with a toothpick.
